member.name: IDXGIFactory.EnumAdapters
member.param: The index of the adapter to enumerate.
The address of a pointer to an interface at the position specified by the Adapter parameter. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns DXGI_ERROR_NOT_FOUND if the index is greater than or equal to the number of adapters in the local system, or DXGI_ERROR_INVALID_CALL if ppAdapter parameter is NULL.

member.name: IDXGIFactory.GetWindowAssociation
member.summary: Get the window through which the user controls the transition to and from full screen.
member.param: A pointer to a window handle.
member.returns: Returns a code that indicates success or failure. S_OK indicates success, DXGI_ERROR_INVALID_CALL indicates pWindowHandle was passed in as NULL.

member.name: IDXGIFactory.MakeWindowAssociation
member.summary: Allows DXGI to monitor an application's message queue for the alt-enter key sequence (which causes the application to switch from windowed to full screen or vice versa).
member.param: The handle of the window that is to be monitored. This parameter can be NULL; but only if Flags is also 0.

param.name: Flags
param.para: One or more of the following values.

item.description: DXGI_MWA_NO_WINDOW_CHANGES - Prevent DXGI from monitoring an applications message queue; this makes DXGI unable to respond to mode changes.
DXGI_MWA_NO_ALT_ENTER - Prevent DXGI from responding to an alt-enter sequence.
DXGI_MWA_NO_PRINT_SCREEN - Prevent DXGI from responding to a print-screen key.

member.returns: DXGI_ERROR_INVALID_CALL if WindowHandle is invalid, or E_OUTOFMEMORY.

member.name: IDXGIFactory
member.summary: An IDXGIFactory interface implements methods for generating DXGI objects (which handle full screen transitions).
